workouts.name: Push-ups
workouts.description: Push-ups are a great bodyweight exercise that target the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: Squats are effective for building strength in the legs, particularly the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that primarily work the muscles in the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: The plank is a core-strengthening exercise that engages multiple muscle groups, including the abs, back, and shoulders.

workouts.name: Jumping Jacks
workouts.description: Jumping jacks are a cardiovascular exercise that also engages the legs, arms, and core muscles.

workouts.name: Bench Press
workouts.description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: Lunges are a unilateral lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

workouts.name: Pull-ups
workouts.description: Pull-ups are a compound exercise that primarily work the muscles in the back and arms.

workouts.name: Russian Twists
workouts.description: Russian twists are a core exercise that target the obliques and improve rotational strength.

workouts.name: Running
workouts.description: Running is a high-intensity cardiovascular exercise that improves endurance and burns calories.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Flyes
workouts.description: Dumbbell flyes are an isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles.

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.description: The leg press is a compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

workouts.name: Barbell Rows
workouts.description: Barbell rows are a compound exercise that target the muscles in the upper back and arms.

workouts.name: Hanging Leg Raises
workouts.description: Hanging leg raises are an advanced core exercise that target the lower abs and hip flexors.

workouts.name: Cycling
workouts.description: Cycling is a low-impact cardiovascular exercise that strengthens the legs and improves cardiovascular health.

workouts.name: Chest Fly Machine
workouts.description: The chest fly machine is a resistance exercise that targets the chest muscles.

workouts.name: Walking Lunges
workouts.description: Walking lunges are a functional lower body exercise that improve balance and coordination.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldowns
workouts.description: Lat pulldowns are a compound exercise that primarily target the latissimus dorsi muscles in the back.

workouts.name: Plank Jacks
workouts.description: Plank jacks are a challenging core exercise that combine the plank position with jumping movements.

workouts.name: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT)
workouts.description: HIIT involves short bursts of intense exercise followed by brief rest periods, resulting in a highly effective cardiovascular workout.
